(Program 
  (Statement 
    (MethodCall 
      (ArgumentList 
        (Pair 
          (Arg 
            (Primary 
              (Lhs 
                (True "true")))) 
          (Symbol)) 
        (Pair 
          (Arg 
            (Primary 
              (Integer "1"))) 
          (Symbol))) 
      (Variable 
        (Identifier "foo")))))
